metadata.title: CVE-2023-6681 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in JWCrypto. This flaw allows an attacker tocause a denial of service (DoS) attack and possible password brute-forceand dictionary attacks to be more resource-intensive. This issue can resultin a large amount of computational consumption, causing a denial of serviceattack.

criterions.comment: python-jwcrypto package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
